price: Nama Isaan irraa ta’e hundaaf guyyaa sana dhimma isa duroomsutu jira.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
